front.title: Definition of the ROLIE Vulnerability Extension

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology

abstract.t: This document extends the Resource-Oriented Lightweight Information Exchange (ROLIE) core to add the information type categories and related requirements needed to support Vulnerability use cases. Additional categories, properties, and requirements based on content type enables a higher level of interoperability between ROLIE implementations, and richer metadata for ROLIE consumers. In particular, usage of the Common Vulnerability Enumeration (CVE) [cve] format is discussed.
